summary: This module implements a collection of graph‑level aggregation utilities for DGL. It offers functions to combine node or edge attributes across a batch of graphs using operations such as sum, mean, max, softmax and top‑k, as well as helpers for broadcasting values between nodes and edges.
business_intent: Enable deep‑learning models built on DGL to efficiently compute graph‑level representations by aggregating node and edge features across multiple graphs in a batch.
